author: Special Correspondent
text:
Sterlite Copper distributed utensils to 1,500 flood-hit families of two hamlets on Wednesday.

An official statement said that Sterlite Copper was continuously working with the local administration in providing relief measures to the flood-affected community in and around Thoothukudi.

Based on the assessment done recently, Sterlite Copper distributed relief materials such as utensils to 1,500 affected families in Aiyyanadaippu and Maravanmadam.

D. Dhanavel, Head, Commercial & Asset Optimisation, Sterlite Copper, and Chandran, Tahsildhar, Thoothukudi, distributed the relief materials to the beneficiaries.

R. Kailasam, Chief Medical Officer and Head Corporate Social Responsibility, and M. Esakkiappan, Head, Public Relations, Sterlite Copper, were present.

They were distributed to the families in Aiyyanadaippu and Maravanmadam
title: Relief materials given to flood-hit families
